description: Try our easy to follow Toast With Poached Eggs & Mushrooms recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Eggs on toast,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Low salt,Quick & easy breakfast,Egg,Low sugar,Mushroom,Father's Day,Halal,High protein,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Toast With Poached Eggs & Mushrooms Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large frying pan over medium-high heat. Add the mushrooms and thyme and cook for 3-4 minutes or until golden. Season to taste. Keep warm.

Bring a saucepan of water to the boil. Add vinegar and remove from heat. Break 2 eggs into a saucer. Slide into water 1 at a time. Cover and leave for 3 minutes for soft poached. Remove with slotted spoon and drain on paper towel. Repeat with remaining eggs.
Spoon mushrooms onto toast and top with 2 eggs. Sprinkle with chives and cracked pepper. Serve.
